query: mutation cloneInstance($command: CloneInstanceCommandInput!) { cloneInstance(command: $command) { ...InstanceHeader __typename } } fragment InstanceHeader on Instance { reference status capacity defaultLocation { reference name __typename } defaultSessionDuration { reference description __typename } stream { reference name __typename } sessions { reference __typename } deactivationReason { description preventReactivation __typename } redirectInstance { reference __typename } startDate endDate publishedDate availableOnWebsite createdBy createdOn updatedBy updatedOn __typename }
